name: Company Standards
description:
A 2-day experiment to make a game that lasts only 15 seconds. Company Standards exaggerates (minorly) the insane expectations from companies. The goal is simply to meet the company goal while not forgetting to take the product out of the oven when it's time :). So simple...

Controls (character-based):

WASD-- Move

Space--- Interact / Do task

Escape: Return to menu
